alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 2:24PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Georgetown, southwestern Horry and south central Marion Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 224 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plantersville, or 12 miles west of Murrells Inlet, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Socastee, Dongola, Plantersville, Burgess, Yauhannah, Bucksville and Bucksport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry; Inland Georgetown; Marion
